articles.content: The stock of tyre manufacturer Balkrishna Industries Ltd has beaten competitors in the last one year by a wide margin. Its shares have risen by 31% in the said time span, while peers Apollo Tyres Ltd… [+1952 chars]

articles.title: NBFC stocks rise as RBI delays implementation of new NPA norms - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: The Reserve Bank of India on February 15 extended the deadline for adhering to the rules from March 31 to September 30.
articles.content:
Shares of non-bank finance companies gained on February 16 after the central bank gave more time to NBFCs to comply with its new rules for upgrade of non-performing assets (NPAs) to standard ones.

articles.title: LIC policyholders need to update PAN details by February 28 to participate in IPO - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: On February 13, the state-run insurer filed draft papers with capital market regulator Sebi for the sale of a 5 per cent stake by the government for an estimated Rs 63,000 crore.

articles.title: IBM Acquires Neudesic, Leading Microsoft Azure Consultancy - IBM Newsroom
articles.description: IBM announced it has acquired Neudesic, a leading U.S. cloud services consultancy specializing primarily in the Microsoft Azure platform, along with bringing skills in multicloud.
articles.content:
